text: Digau hagadonu ala i Rome, ne longo bolo gimaadou i golo, ga lloomoi loo haga mogowaa gi nia waahale e lua go “Di Gowaa Huihui mee o Appius” mo “Nia Hale e Dolu”, belee heetugi mai gi gimaadou. Di madagoaa Paul ne gidee digaula, gei mee gu hai dana danggee ang gi God, gei gu damana mai dono hagadagadagagee.
